article.name: Buttercup
article.description:
Can\'t stop now, just done Blossom, and Bubbles... best get on and draw Buttercup. Green eyes, green dress, black clean cut hair, looking tough. I\'m proud of this one. I don\'t normally sketch Butercup, but this image came out especially well.
See my drawings of Bubbles and Blossom.
article.keywords: powerpuff, blossom, drawing, girls, ppg, bubbles, buttercup, cartoon network, john beech, mkv25, macromedia, flash
